authors: John Myles (Actoba on Roll20.net, @jmyles85 on Twitter)
instructions: This sheet is designed for use with the full release of DnD 5th edition.  Where possible, it supports the 'rules as written' as listed in the Basic DnD PDF that's freely available for download, and the Players Handbook (PHB) that was released in August 2014.  Sheet help is available on the roll20 wiki - https://wiki.roll20.net/DnD5E_Community_Contributed
